info.text: This is a peripheral nerve out of here to the Reproductive System. Its broken though.
[query]Do you have any nerves and brain tissue to help repair this?data*prPERIPHERAL_NERVE,prBRAIN_TISSUE;That's not quite enough
Thanks! Give me a second while I fix this...
While you wait, did you know that the major organs of the nervous system are the brain, the spinal cord, and the peripheral nerves.
The nervous system uses these body components to control and coordinate bodily functions, respond to stimuli, and maintain homeostasis.
The nervous system is needed for all the other body systems to function.
Its done! Time for you to go!
